author: bakkutteh
description: Connects Red with the Clash of Clans API using coc.py.
install_msg: Before loading this cog, set your COC API username and password with `[p]set api clashapi`. Valid tokens: `username`, `password`, `keys`. You can register for an account at https://developer.clashofclans.com.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not collect or store any data.
